summary: A journalist comes to the aid of a murderer with a life sentence when she makes an appeal in court and although he is given his freedom, they soon discover that there is a grim reason behind his release.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Sunil Shetty|Raveena Tandon|Naseeruddin Shah|Paresh Rawal|Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Poonam Jhawer|Raza Murad|Gulshan Grover|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Sonali Singh|Avtar Gill|Priya Tendulkar|Kunickaa Sadanand|Tej Sapru|Dinesh Anand|Razak Khan|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Yunus Parvez|Harish Patel|Vinay Sapru|Gavin Packard|Aparajita|Jaikar Shetty|Anil Nagrath|Arif Khan|Sanjeev Chitre|Sikander Khan|Roopesh Mantri|Amit Bhalla|Abid Shah|John Gabriel|Ramesh Goyal|Brijesh Tripathi|Anil Yadav|Viju Penkar|Gopal Poojari|Rashid Mehta|Amar Kuber|Alpana|Shyamli|Master Nimeet Shah
title: Mohra
